content: Zhen Wu Zhen Wu (吴震) School of Artificial Intelligence, Nanjing University (NJU) Address: 163 Xianlin Avenue, Qixia District, Nanjing, China Office: Room A-201, Yifu Building Email: wuz [at] nju.edu.cn About Me [Google Scholar] Now I am an Assistant Professor at the School of Artificial Intelligence, Nanjing University (NJU), and a member of NJUNLP group, led by Prof. Jiajun Chen. Before that, I received my Ph.D. degree from the Department of Computer Science and Technology of Nanjing University (NJU) in 2021, supervised by Prof. Xinyu Dai. Research Interest My recent research interests mainly include emotional intelligence, multimodal computation, and large language models. News 2025-02-23: Invited to be an Area Chair (AC) for ACL 2025. 2024-10-06: RAGLAB was accepted by EMNLP 2024 Demo Track (CCF-B, oral). 2024-09-26: AutoSurvey was accepted by NeurIPS 2024 (CCF-A). 2024-09-20: One paper was accepted by EMNLP 2024 (CCF-B). 2024-07-16: One paper was accepted by ACM Multimedia 2024 (CCF-A). 2024-05-16: Two papers were accepted by ACL 2024 (CCF-A). 2024-03-16: One paper was accepted by NAACL 2024 (CCF-B). 2024-02-20: One paper was accepted by COLING 2024 (CCF-B). 2023-10-08: Four papers were accepted by EMNLP 2023 (CCF-B). 2023-09-23: We won the runner-up of the Evaluation of Large Model of Finance Technology (SMP2023-ELMFT) out of 2294 teams.
